lead_paragraph: Jaber al-Bakr, 22, took his own life in a jail cell in Leipzig, where he had been taken after being arrested on suspicion of planning an imminent attack.

headline.print_headline: Suspect in German Terror Case Kills Himself in Jail
headline.main: Syrian Refugee in German Terror Case Kills Himself in Jail

snippet: Jaber al-Bakr, 22, took his own life in a jail cell in Leipzig, where he had been taken after being arrested on suspicion of planning an imminent attack....
abstract: German authorities announce death of Jaber al-Bakr, Syrian accused of planning imminent terrorist attack; 22-year-old committed suicide in jail cell.
